original_text: This people draweth nigh unto me with their mouth, and honoureth me with their lips; but their heart is far from me.
korean_text: 이 백성이 입술로는 나를 공경하되 마음은 내게서 멀도다

sentences.original_text: This people draweth nigh unto me
and honoureth me with their lips
but their heart is far from me
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들의 마음은 내게서 멀리 떠나 있느니라
